creator: raymondsjunkguard
title: Steve Jobs Tribute Pumpkin
description: This project involves carving a pumpkin with an image of Steve Jobs. The image is enhanced with contrast digitally before being carved into the pumpkin using carving tools and a sewing needle for detail.
steps: Introduce contrast to the iconic photo of Steve Jobs digitally.
Map out the image on the pumpkin, deciding what areas to carve out.
Carve the pumpkin using pumpkin carving tools.
Use a sewing needle for creating smaller holes and finer details.
